meanings.definition: Enlargement of a man's breasts, typically due to hormonal imbalance.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with gynecomastia after noticing the breast enlargement.
meanings.sent2: Gynecomastia can be caused by hormonal changes during puberty.
meanings.sent3: When he tried on a tight shirt, his gynecomastia made him look like he had pecs.
meanings.sent4: His gynecomastia was a mountain he had to climb, but he faced it bravely.
meanings.sent5: The gynecomastia was like a balloon slowly inflating, causing discomfort.

meanings.definition: The condition of having excessive breast tissue in males.
meanings.sent1: He felt self-conscious about his gynecomastia and avoided taking off his shirt.
meanings.sent2: Some medications can lead to gynecomastia as a side effect.
meanings.sent3: His gynecomastia was like a secret he kept hidden under layers of clothing.
meanings.sent4: The gynecomastia weighed on his chest like a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The gynecomastia stood out like a sore thumb, making him feel out of place.
